courses.description: Beginning Mandarin Chinese. Class practice and assigned outside work in pronunciation, sentence structure, reading, writing and introduction to Chinese culture. 3 lectures, 1 activity.

courses.hasPrerequisite: CHIN 101 or appropriate score on placement exam or consent of instructor
courses.description: Class practice and assigned outside work in pronunciation, sentence structure, reading, writing and introduction to Chinese culture.  To be taken in numerical sequence.  3 lectures, 1 activity.

courses.description: Development of presentational, interpersonal, and interpretive intermediate-level language skills in Mandarin Chinese within an intercultural context.  To be taken in numerical sequence.  3 lectures, 1 activity.  Fulfills GE C5.
